headline.main: Tens of Thousands, Including Women, Toil on Fortifications -- Reserve Troops and Arms Pour In and Out of Capital

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Oct. 19 -- With the residents of Moscow rallying tonight to defend the city, a "thorough transformation" of the suburbs within the last few days was reported by Tass, official news agency.
abstract: Ital press comment on effect of USSR scorched earth policy; Tass, official news agency, repts Moscow civilians rally to defend city; Prof V L Komaroff stresses gravity of situation; London reaction to Moscow broadcasts; German-Ital pact on exploitation of conquered USSR territory expected
snippet: MOSCOW, Oct. 19 -- With the residents of Moscow rallying tonight to defend the city, a "thorough transformation" of the suburbs within the last few days was reported by Tass, official news agency....
